turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you get me a pizza from Pizza hut real quick?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what kind of pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large pan pepperoni pizza with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large pan pepperoni pizza with extra cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You mean like personal pan or large pan?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large pan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that would be 11.99. Do you have the money for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you be paying cash or credit card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Credit card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My Capital One card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, when do you want the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it ASAP.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will take me about 10 minutes to drive to the nearest Pizza Hut, and it will probably take them about 15 minutes to make the pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll let you know when they finish the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. I just completed the order, I'll be able to pick up the pizza in about 25 minutes.
